text: Mérey-sous-Montrond is a former commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. On 1 January 2022, it was merged into the new commune of Les Monts-Ronds.Arrêté préfectoral, p. 39, 22 December 2021 == References == Category:Former communes in Doubs
title: Mérey-sous-Montrond
